metadata.title: Riverbay Furniture 25" Retro Wood/Fabric Tufted Counter Stool in Beige
features: Material: Elm wood, foam, fabric upholstery (5% linen, 95% poly)
description: The Riverbay Furniture Tufted Square Back Counter Stool is a chic addition to a bar or kitchen area. The French design of the decorative elm frame is accented by the natural rustic finish. Upholstered in a light linen fabric and finished with a tufted back, the stool is perfect for adding style and seating to your home.Features :- Material: Elm wood, foam, fabric upholstery (5% linen, 95% poly)- Finish: Light natural brown, beige- Decorative elm frame- Square tufted seat back- Counter height.Specifications :- Product Dimensions : 43.5"H x 18.25"W x 22.38"D- Product Weight : 19.85 lbs- Seat Dimensions : 25"H x 18.25"W x 17.25"D- Weight Capacity : 275 lbs- Assembly Required : Fully Assembled.
